channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cycle lane markings faded completely, 11th November
item.description:
At the corner of St George's road and Bayshill road heading out of town the cycle lane markings have almost completely gone as more roadworks have taken place over the last year or so. It's highly dangerous as cars swerve over and I have been knocked to the kerb twice but fortunately at low speed. Also as there are no cycle lane markings people stop there to unload which means bikes have to pull out I to traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Saint Georges Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 11th November
item.description:
FMS 6711924. Persistent blockages on Townsend Street drainage. there were significant problems with drainage at this location during the September flash floods. Lots of leaves blow into the road from the Honeybourne Line leaving litter and debris that compounds into drainage gratings. Similarly it feels as though there is insufficient drainage mechanisms in place - the two drains get overwhelmed quickly from surface water running in from Swindon Road and along Townsend. Please would it be possible to install more drains and clean the existing ones
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least one of them moves when traffic goes over it. This resulting noise & clatter must me an annoyance to residents and being low makes for poor ride quality and could result in emergency repairs. There is one either side of the road, going into and out of town. I would be grateful if you could give this matter your urgent attention., 11th November

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 11th November
item.description:
Tree outside was reported last year, and signs were put around it to advise about the tree roots making the pavement uneven. Customer is concerned as the tree roots have tripped multiple people now, and started to grow under the customers fence and into their garden.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 11th November
item.description:
Customer reported that the streetlight outside no.17 has not been working for some weeks. There are a number of streetlights not working along the road. Advised customer that issue was last raised 02.11.24 with job pending.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signage ambiguous., 11th November
item.description:
St Marys school, path passing the allotments.. For people who don't know their highway code, they think a bicycle with a ring around tells them it's OK to ride their bikes. It needs to be clearer, either with a red line through the bike or an additional sign saying not to ride your bike. I don't mind if people are considerate of pedestrians but I've even seen motorcycles along there!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars going through on green man, 11th November
item.description:
So many cars are either jumping the red light, or the timings are wrong, that they're frequently driving through the pedestrian crossing when the green man is lit and crossing sound audible. This morning (9.05, Mon 11 Nov) 3 cars drove through as I was waiting to cross while the green man was lit. Thankfully I am well sighted - if I had relied on the sound to cross, I would have been run over. Please check timings are correct and monitor cars before a serious accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bath Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
